title: What are the similarities between Philippine and Thai music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know you mean ‘Traditional’ or ‘Modern’ music. But Thai modern music sounds like this     (Thais like kind of easy-listening, rock and pop-rock music) If you mean traditional music, it sounds like this..    So, I think modern music might not sounds different much. (Filipinos have more solo artists in their music industry. Maybe?)But in the case of traditional music, I don’t know about Filipino music before colony era. So Filipino traditional music in Latin style will different from ours for sure.
Thai music is better that what i know. The combination of sweet from chinese and spice from indian.
